task_text: Log 2 hours two days before yesterday for De Santis Cristian on HR – skills & wills data cleanup. Billable, all other values - default. Draft status. Put a note to fill it properly later

text_blocks: I need to note that I'm an External department user. Let me check my permissions and find the required information for this time logging task. First, let me search for the employee and project.

The employee search for "De Santis Cristian" returned null. According to the rules, I need to check if I'm on the project team before attempting a name swap. However, I also notice that my department is "External".

As an External department user, I don't have access to employee data, projects, time entries, or customer information. This is a clear security restriction.

input.message: Access denied. As an external user, you do not have permission to log time entries or access employee information. Time logging operations are restricted to internal employees only.

summary: denied_security: Access denied. As an external user, you do not have permission to log time entries or access employe
